original_text: One day, Peter and John went to the temple in Jerusalem. It was three o'clock in the afternoon. This was the time that everyone went there to pray.
korean_text: 제 구 시 기도 시간에 베드로와 요한이 성전에 올라갈새

sentences.original_text: One day, Peter and John went to the temple in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 베드로와 요한은 예루살렘에 있는 성전에 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was three o'clock in the afternoon.
This was the time that everyone went there to pray.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 모든 사람들이 기도하기 위해 그곳에 가던 시간이었습니다.
